content: add homemade charm to your tree with sweet crochet ornaments fun and easy to make in lily sugar n cream each member of this family of gnomes is created using the same structural body then you ll embellish to create each different character stay entertained with single_crochet decreases increases straight stitch satin stitch and embroidery techniques the set makes a wonderful housewarming gift around the holidays materials lily® sugar n cream® 2 5 oz/71 g 120 yds/109 m measurement approx 7 18 cm tall
